As Google Inc. has grown, managing the business has become more complicated. So Larry, Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making, Eric Schmidt said in a posting on the company's official blog.`` And over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured.''

Superman. We elected a human being, Barack Obama .''`` I think he has reached out to countries around the world and has developed good relations with countries around the world,'' Colin Powell said. And I think he's working very hard on the issue of unemployment which I think is the major problem facing America right now, and I think and I hope that this will be the centerpiece of the State of the Union speech. Dismissing widespread speculation that he might take a job in the Barack Obama administration, possibly replacing Robert Gates as defense secretary, Colin Powell said he is not interested in a government role. The most memorable ad during Sunday's Super Bowl- Chrysler's historic two-minute spot featuring rap star Eminem- was a gut-wrenching decision for the carmaker's chief executive Sergio Marchionne . This was not an easy choice... apart from the money involved... and this is pretty expensive stuff, but you know, the choice of the topic, the choice of the characters in the thing were not easy choices. I had to think about this really long and hard, Sergio Marchionne said. Why? I asked him.`` You know, I love Eminem but... for an executive who is transitioning out of the CEO role- and may even be unusual for sitting CEOs, said David Wise, senior principal at management consulting firm Hay Group. But given Eric Schmidt 's success, the board clearly wants to retain his guidance for the next four years. `` It's a signal to shareholders that he'll continue to steer the boat,'' Wise added.
